page.content: These flats are designed to meet the needs of the elderly, which is a growing problem in 1985 because as people live longer, the percentage of elderly people in the community is increasing. Many very large private houses, which in the past would have been run with the aid of several servants, are now being divided into several smaller flats, which suit the needs of our smaller families today. THE UNION CANAL In January 1793, a meeting was held to discuss the possibility of having a canal linking Edinburgh and Glasgow. The canal was to be a communication between Edinburgh and any port at the head of the Firth of Forth.
